xc:entity.dcterms:title: African American newspapers the 19th century.
xc:entity.dcterms:description: Title from about archives page (viewed June 23, 2003).
xc:entity.dcterms:tableOfContents: Freedom's journal (Mar. 16, 1827-Mar. 28, 1829) -- The Colored American / Weekly Advocate (Jan. 7, 1837-Dec. 25, 1841) -- The North Star (Dec. 3, 1847-Apr. 17, 1851) -- The National Era (Jan. 7, 1847-Dec. 1857; complete only through Dec. 1853) -- Provincial Freeman (1854-1857) -- Frederick Douglass Paper (1851-1859; complete only through Dec. 1852) -- The Christian Recorder (1861-June 1868; complete only through April, 1862).
xc:entity.dcterms:identifier: http://www.accessible.com For subscribers only; follow links to resource
